data.event: July is the hottest month, with a daily average of 74.1 °F (23.4 °C); highs reach 100 °F (38 °C) on 10.7 days in a typical year and 90 °F (32 °C) on 57 days.
Yet because of the aridity, summer nights typically cool to below 60 °F (16 °C).
